nodes.text: The New Republic Obelisk was a monument located on the New Republic's capital world of Coruscant as of 25 ABY. A tall and thin needle made out of stone, the Obelisk was constructed in order to symbolize the unity of the New Republic. Kuati Senator Viqi Shesh's office featured a grand view of both the obelisk and the avenue Commerce Way.
The New Republic Obelisk's only appearance was in James Luceno's novel Agents of Chaos II: Jedi Eclipse, which was released in 2000 as an installment of The New Jedi Order series.
